Articles.Content:
I just installed the latest update. Now I can not resume a saved game. When I click on it does nothing. I created a new career, went into the game fine. Came out and tried to back in and the same thing happened. It will not load previous saved games.

I do have mods and even removed them and the problem exists.

Any ideas?

Thank you

There is a problem with overeheating as soon as you leave the atmosphere. I activated the cheat Ignore Max Temperature to see the effect. As soon as I left the atmosphere the decouplers overheated and spread the heat acoss the whole ship, raising the temperature to the gazillion degrees, no joke. See the thread [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126471-Craft-exploding-(overheat)-1-0-4?p=2044267](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126471-Craft-exploding-%28overheat%29-1-0-4?p=2044267) . I reverted back to 1.03 for I had the game backed up. You only lose any ships created in 1.04. It will say that the career is not compatible, just reload a new 1.04 saved game and the career file will be brought up to date, if this is what you prefer to do. I found the 1.04 unplayable, for I also have tons of mods installed.

[![To%20hot_zpsmmk6zyjg.jpg](http://i1324.photobucket.com/albums/u603/Bonemachine1/To%20hot_zpsmmk6zyjg.jpg)](http://s1324.photobucket.com/user/Bonemachine1/media/To%20hot_zpsmmk6zyjg.jpg.html)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T15:38:38Z" title="06/27/2015 03:38  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by CrasHReBooT**
  
Typo error
I found the problem. One of my saved saved science game folder got corrupted. Some how this prevented me from resuming other saved games.

> 
> I found the problem. One of my saved saved science game folder got corrupted. Some how this prevented me from resuming other saved games.

Did you ever find a fix for this?

> 
> Did you ever find a fix for this?

Yes I did. I had a one of my career folders was corrupted. All I did is delete it.
